cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 4th Nov 2025 (NZDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 4th Nov 2025 (NZDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

cancellationPolicies.label: Non-refundable rates
cancellationPolicies.description: Your booking is non-refundable. If you choose to cancel your booking, or in the case of a no-show, you will still be charged the full cost of your booking.

privates.name: Basic Double Bed Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: Our Basic Budget Lakeview studio units have en-suites with showers, TV and phone. There is a basic communal kitchen available for guest's use

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Deluxe 3 Bed Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: These lakeview studio units have king-size beds with an extra single bed, en-suite, tea and coffee-making facilities, and fridge.Balcony units with showers only.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

privates.name: Deluxe Double Bed Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: These lakeview studio units have 1 King bed some with 1 single with stunning view. All units have  ensuites all with baths. TV , Phone, Tea & coffee-making facilities.

privates.name: Standard 3 Bed Private Ensuite
privates.description: In order to secure a Private Room, you will need to book the entire room.
privates.labelDescription: These lakeview studio units have 1 Queen bed, and 2 single beds . All units have  ensuites all with baths. TV , Phone, Tea & coffee-making facilities.
